segments.text: Those kids are sneaking cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing on that stool like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so irresponsible; what if he falls and breaks something?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand out like she deserves a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the mother just stands there, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the water running over the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, and she's stepping in it blindly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what happens when adults aren't paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen's going to be a mess because of this negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get so frustrated seeing kids get into trouble like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's pure mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They better not make me clean up after their stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR
